about.details:
Incorporated in 2013, Global Pet Industries Limited is a manufacturer and exporter of Two Stage PET Stretch Blow Moulding Machines.

PET Stretch Blow Moulding Machine is used for manufacturing machines that are suitable in the business segment of Pet stretch below moulding solutions from 50ml to 20 Litres of PET bottles such as fridge bottles, packaged drinking mineral water bottles, carbonated soft drinks bottles, hot fill juice bottles, edible oil bottles, liquid detergent bottles, cosmetic products bottles, confectionery jars, Pharma bottles, liquor & distilleries bottles, pesticides bottles, etc.

Apart from manufacturing PET Stretch Blow Moulding Machines, the company also provides after-sales services such as providing spares, components, and accessories and providing repairs and maintenance of the machines after delivery.

The company has 2 manufacturing units, both located in Palghar, Maharashtra.

Global Pet Industries have two business divisions (i) domestic sales; and (ii) exports. It has a presence in 19 states for its domestic market based on sales made for the period ending December 31, 2022. Internationally, it supplies products in 19 countries including Cameroon, the Central African Republic, Ghana, Haiti, Kenya, Mozambique, Nigeria, Nepal, Qatar, South Africa, Tanzania, Tunisia, UAE, Uganda, Liberia, the United States of America, Bhutan, Zambia and Zimbabwe based on sales made for the period ended December 31, 2022.

faqs.question: What is the Global Pet Industries IPO?
faqs.answer:
Global Pet Industries IPO is a SME IPO of 2700000 equity shares of the face value of ₹10 aggregating up to ₹13.23 Crores. The issue is priced at ₹49 per share. The minimum order quantity is 3000.

The IPO opens on June 28, 2023, and closes on July 3, 2023.

Bigshare Services Pvt Ltd is the registrar for the IPO. The shares are proposed to be listed on NSE SME.

faqs.question: How to apply in Global Pet Industries IPO through Zerodha?
faqs.answer:
Zerodha customers can apply online in Global Pet Industries IPO using UPI as a payment gateway. Zerodha customers can apply in Global Pet Industries IPO by login into Zerodha Console (back office) and submitting an IPO application form.

Steps to apply in Global Pet Industries IPO through Zerodha

  1. Visit the Zerodha website and login to Console.
  2. Go to Portfolio and click the IPOs link.
  3. Go to the 'Global Pet Industries IPO' row and click the 'Bid' button.
  4. Enter your UPI ID, Quantity, and Price.
  5. Submit IPO application form.
  6. Visit the UPI App (net banking or BHIM) to approve the mandate.

Visit Zerodha IPO Application Process Review for more detail.

faqs.question: When Global Pet Industries IPO will open?
faqs.answer: The Global Pet Industries IPO opens on June 28, 2023 and closes on July 3, 2023.

faqs.question: What is the lot size of Global Pet Industries IPO?
faqs.answer: Global Pet Industries IPO lot size is 3000, and the minimum amount required is ₹1,47,000.

faqs.question: How to apply for Global Pet Industries IPO?
faqs.answer: You can apply in Global Pet Industries IPO online using either UPI or ASBA as a payment method. ASBA IPO application is available in the net banking of your bank account. UPI IPO application is offered by brokers who don't offer banking services. Read more detail about applying IPO online through Zerodha, Upstox, 5Paisa, Nuvama, HDFC Bank, and SBI Bank.

faqs.question: When is Global Pet Industries IPO allotment?
faqs.answer: The finalization of Basis of Allotment for Global Pet Industries IPO will be done on Thursday, July 6, 2023, and the allotted shares will be credited to your demat account by Monday, July 10, 2023. Check the Global Pet Industries IPO allotment status.

faqs.question: When is Global Pet Industries IPO listing date?
faqs.answer: The Global Pet Industries IPO listing date is on Monday, July 10, 2023.
